name: Renewable Energy Group, Inc.
description: Renewable Energy Group, Inc. (REG) is a leading provider of cleaner, renewable fuels and a pioneer in the biofuels industry. Founded in 1996, REG focuses on converting waste materials into high-quality, low-carbon renewable fuels, primarily biodiesel and renewable diesel. The company's mission is to create a more sustainable energy future through innovation and technology, helping to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and reliance on fossil fuels. REG operates a network of biorefineries across the United States, producing millions of gallons of renewable fuel each year. The company is committed to the principles of sustainability and works closely with farmers, partners, and stakeholders to promote sustainable agriculture and energy practices. In addition to fuel production, REG also offers renewable fuel distribution and marketing services, providing customers with access to clean fuel alternatives. With a dedicated focus on research and development, REG continues to explore new feedstock sources and advanced technologies to enhance its production capabilities and environmental benefits. The company's ongoing efforts to expand its renewable product offerings position it as a key player in the transition towards a more sustainable energy landscape.

seo.meta_title: Renewable Energy Group, Inc. | Leader in Renewable Fuels
seo.meta_description: Explore Renewable Energy Group, Inc., a leader in the production of biofuels and renewable energy solutions. Learn about REG's commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What does Renewable Energy Group do?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group produces cleaner, renewable fuels from waste materials, focusing on biodiesel and renewable diesel.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Renewable Energy Group?
faq.answer: Cynthia (Cindy) J. Warner is the CEO of Renewable Energy Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Renewable Energy Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group is headquartered in Ames, Iowa, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Renewable Energy Group?
faq.answer: The main products include biodiesel and renewable diesel, along with fuel distribution and marketing services.

faq.question: When was Renewable Energy Group founded?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group was founded in 1996.
